text: I take charge and try to lead others
I am a cheerful person and I always radiate joy to people around me
I am an adrenaline junkie and I want to try all kind of thrilling activities at least once
I enjoy making new friends and feel comfortable around people
I don't like to draw attention to myself
I like to take things seriously and don't like it when people joke around about everything
I value my safety and wouldn't engage in crazy and dangerous activities (car racing, bungee jumping, sky diving, etc)
I don't open up about my feelings or problems with people easily and prefer to have time alone
I spend time reflecting on things and tend to daydream so often
I like variety and trying new things (taste new food, learn a new language, earn a new skill, etc)
I love reading complex and challenging material
I believe that laws, societal norms and traditions should be adapted to the evolution of the modern world
I focus on the here and now and would rely on my experience rather than my imagination
I am a creature of habit and like having a routine
I avoid philosophical and abstract discussions
I believe that new generations have drifted apart from their roots and traditions under the name of "freedom"
I don't easily trust people and believe everyone has hidden motives
People say I have a sharp tongue (You tell the truth even when it hurts)
I don't allocate much time for others, I think everyone should be able to deal with their problems alone
Believe deep inside that I'm better than others
I have a difficulty relating to others' feelings
I am convinced all humans are inherently good (there's a good side in everyone)
I avoid getting into controversial topics or conversations that could cause disagreement between me and others
I am concerned about others and feel it's my responsibility to help them
I don't talk a lot about my achievements or successes in front of others
I sympathize a lot with people that are worse-off than me and often feel sad when I see people suffering
I try to avoid making mistakes as much as I can, and like to always have a backup plan
I plunge into tasks with all of my heart and tend to do more of what's expected from me
I like order, I make plans and To-Do-Lists and always stick to them
I live by the motto of "You Only Live Once" and get myself going with the flow
I need a push to get started in a task and always get things done on last-minute
I leave my belongings around and don't mind staying in a messy place.
I worry about things and fear that they might go wrong
I tend to overreact to situations (exple: lose my temper, stress about trivial matters, etc)
I have frequent mood swings
I tend to feel awkward or intimdated in unfamiliar situations or with unfamiliar people
I don't think I have big problems to worry about in my life, things are rather going well for me
I'm not easily annoyed and even if I am, I usually calm down very quickly
I have a lot of happy thoughts and am pleased about myself in general
I don't have a problem with being on stage or delivering a public speech in a large group of people
